XOrder.CreateAnonymousOrderEnabled.title: Anonymous orders creation (xAPI)
XOrder.CreateAnonymousOrderEnabled.description: Prohibit/ allow anonymous order creation. This is a store-level setting

XPurchase.IsSelectedForCheckout.title: Default "Selected for checkout" state (xAPI)
XPurchase.IsSelectedForCheckout.description: Preselect/ leave unselected all items in cart by default at checkout. This is a store-level setting for new items and gifts
